    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <div comment_id="4491192156504890" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

                                                                                                                        【最新！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E4%BA%BA%E6%95%B0%E8%B6%85132%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球累计感染人数超132万例#</a>】截至北京时间4月7日15时，全球已有<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23209%E4%B8%AA%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%92%8C%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#209个国家和地区出现确诊病例#</a>，累计确诊1321523例，累计死亡74316例。其中，美国感染人数368376例。转发关注<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E8%B5%B0%E5%8A%BF%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎疫情全球走势#</a>↓↓ ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4491165174663067&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【扩散周知！4月8日起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2326%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E8%B4%AD%E7%A5%A8%E6%97%85%E5%AE%A2%E5%9B%9E%E5%9B%BD%E9%9C%80%E5%A1%AB%E6%8A%A5%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E7%89%88%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E7%A0%81%23&amp;from=default">#26国已购票旅客回国需填报国际版健康码#</a>】自4月8日起，从意大利、美国、西班牙等26个国家已购买回国机票的中国籍旅客需要提前通过防疫健康码国际版微信小程序填报防疫健康信息。2020年4月8日至4月22日为过渡期。旅客未按要求填报的，将无法登机；填报虚假信息，将导致行程受阻 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICfy09DSg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491162322298232:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491162322298232&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            </div>

        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                                                                                                                        【正在直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%235G%2BAI%E6%97%A0%E4%BA%BA%E8%BD%A6%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%87%8D%E5%90%AF%23&amp;from=default">#5G+AI无人车直播武汉重启#</a>】4月8日0:00，沉睡了76天的武汉将伴随一场江滩“巨屏”灯光秀苏醒，人民直播无人车利用5G+AI技术带陪你见证武汉重启。我们熟悉的那个武汉，回来了！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%87%8D%E5%90%AF%E5%80%92%E8%AE%A1%E6%97%B6%23&amp;from=default">#武汉重启倒计时#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4491148574008278:1034-video:1034%3A4491342693466122:page_100206_home:2803301701:4491148574008278:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZD4FNh" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZD4FNh" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4491145293661895" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICf6xfmCP?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 18:39" date="1586255942000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491145293661895:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 18:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【你们辛苦了！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E6%9C%BA%E9%95%BF%E6%8E%A5%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%80%E6%89%B9%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E5%9B%9E%E5%AE%B6%23&amp;from=default">#英雄机长接四川最后一批援鄂队员回家#</a>】4月7日，四川最后一批援鄂医疗队员回家，英雄机长刘传健熟悉的身影再次出现。四川最后一批援鄂医疗队员162人包括华西医院140人、疾控三队14人、中国医学科学院输血研究所6人、以及国家单独抽调的华西医院、成都公卫中心的2名院感专家。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICf6xfmCP" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491145293661895:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491145293661895&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%898%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E5%87%BA%E7%A7%9F%E8%BD%A6%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%23&amp;from=default">#武汉8日起恢复出租车运营#</a> 】4月8日起，武汉市将恢复出租车运营，并将根据疫情形势变化和市场状况，适时恢复网约车运营。据悉，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%87%BA%E7%A7%9F%E8%BD%A6%E5%B0%86%E5%AE%9E%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%80%E8%BD%A6%E4%B8%80%E7%A0%81%23&amp;from=default">#武汉出租车将实行一车一码#</a>，驾驶员全程戴口罩为乘客提供服务，乘客凭健康码“绿码”实名登记扫码乘车。武汉市客管处表示，已要求各出租车企业召回车辆，对车辆进行全面 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICf3Tyvbn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491143658223021:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491143658223021&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B5%B5%E7%AB%8B%E5%9D%9A%E9%A9%B3%E6%96%A5%E6%8A%B9%E9%BB%91%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8F%B4%E6%84%8F%E7%9A%84%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E5%AA%92%E4%BD%93%23&amp;from=default">#赵立坚驳斥抹黑中国援意的英国媒体#</a>：无中生有】近日，有英国媒体称中国强迫意大利回购捐赠物资。4月7日，外交部发言人赵立坚表示，意大利疫情暴发以来，我们十分关注，急人所急尽力向意方提供帮助。中方的帮助体现了急难有情的朋友之义，我们真诚希望意大利早日控制疫情，民众健康得到保护。任何无 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICeUaaHNo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491137622551634:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491137622551634&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【就在今晚！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%B9%B4%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E8%B6%85%E7%BA%A7%E6%9C%88%E4%BA%AE%E4%BB%8A%E6%99%9A%E4%B8%8A%E6%BC%94%23&amp;from=default">#全年最大超级月亮今晚上演#</a>，来人民日报看直播】4月7日入夜后至4月8日日出前，月亮将运行到近地点附近，形成今年最大<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B6%85%E7%BA%A7%E6%9C%88%E4%BA%AE%23&amp;from=default">#超级月亮#</a>现象，这一晚，满月几乎整夜可见。今晚20:00至明日5:00，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 联合“仰望星空”天文科普团队，在星星的故乡宁夏，为你呈现一场明朗的星月童话！别错过！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx1.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2Fa716fd45ly1gdlcn3vm2gj20u01hb1gr.jpg">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4491130848988020" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICeJeBIc4?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 17:41" date="1586252498000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491130848988020:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 17:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E5478%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新增新冠肺炎5478例#</a>，新增死亡743例】据西班牙卫生部7日公布的数据，西班牙较前日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例5478例，新增死亡病例743例，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BE%BE140510%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙累计确诊病例达140510例#</a>，其中13798人死亡，43208人治愈出院。（姜波） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8E%92%E5%A4%96%E6%83%85%E7%BB%AA%E4%B8%8A%E5%8D%87%E8%A8%80%E8%AE%BA%23&amp;from=default">#外交部回应中国排外情绪上升言论#</a>：反对一切形式的歧视与偏见】今天的外交部例行记者会上，有记者提问：有媒体评论称，自中国为防止疫情输入，收紧外国人入境管控措施以来，出现了一些外国人抱怨在中国受歧视的报道，认为中国排外情绪上升，你对此有何评论？赵立坚作3点回应：第一，中方始终高度重 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICeG2BHxS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491128868985528:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491128868985528&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%99%E5%AE%A4%E9%80%9A%E9%A3%8E%E6%97%B6%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%8A%E8%AF%BE%E5%8F%AF%E4%B8%8D%E6%88%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#教室通风时浙江学生上课可不戴口罩#</a>】4月7日，浙江省人民政府新闻发布会上，省防控工作领导小组办公室常务副主任陈广胜介绍：由于对开学条件建立了逐校确认制度，加上严格实行“健康码+测体温”校园准入、全天健康监测等一整套机制。因此，在保持教室适当通风的情况下，总体说来，学生上课时可以不 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICetrDdRr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491121059348077:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491121059348077&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%80%8D%E5%AE%A3%E5%B8%83%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%AC%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%A5%E7%B4%A7%E6%80%A5%E4%BA%8B%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#安倍宣布东京进入紧急事态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%80%8D%E5%AE%A3%E5%B8%83%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%AC%E7%AD%897%E4%B8%AA%E9%83%BD%E5%BA%9C%E5%8E%BF%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%A5%E7%B4%A7%E6%80%A5%E4%BA%8B%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#安倍宣布东京等7个都府县进入紧急事态#</a>】日本首相安倍晋三4月7日傍晚在日本政府新冠肺炎疫情对策本部会议上宣布：东京、神奈川、埼玉、千叶、大阪、兵库、福冈7个都府县从今日到5月6日为紧急事态。安倍晋三发布紧急事态宣言的依据是为防备新型冠状病毒疫情蔓延而修改的《 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICeoXgTKS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491118274027574:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491118274027574&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【你们辛苦了！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%911000%E5%90%8D%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E5%92%8C%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E5%9D%9A%E5%AE%88%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#近1000名医护和专家坚守武汉#</a>，主要承担重症救治工作】医政医管局监察专员郭燕红介绍，国家和各省医疗队陆续从湖北和武汉撤回。截至昨天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%84%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E5%B7%B2%E6%92%A4%E5%9B%9E3.8%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#各省医疗队已撤回3.8万人#</a>。仍然坚守的还有近1000人和国家医疗工作组的专家，将在武汉承担好重症患者工作，圆满完成救治任务。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICekKk7TI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491115664796922:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491115664796922&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#你好武汉#</a>【打开城门不等于打开家门！武汉回应<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E4%BD%95%E8%A7%A3%E9%99%A4%E7%A6%BB%E6%B1%89%E9%80%9A%E9%81%93%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E8%BF%98%E8%A6%81%E5%B0%81%E6%8E%A7%23&amp;from=default">#为何解除离汉通道小区还要封控#</a>管理】武汉市疫情防控指挥部副指挥长胡曙光：①受疫情形势变化影响，城门打开后，外防输出还要外防输入；②无症状感染者、复阳者都存在潜在风险；③复工复产复市，会有大量人流汇集；④目前武汉主要居民都居住在小区，大家 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICeiQbBfm" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491114482764788:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491114482764788&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E4%BB%A3%E8%A1%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%97%85%E6%AD%BB%E7%8E%87%E6%AF%94%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E4%BD%8E%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织代表回应中国病死率比国外低#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E7%97%85%E6%AD%BB%E7%8E%87%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%8E%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%97%85%E6%AD%BB%E7%8E%87%23&amp;from=default">#为什么国外病死率高于中国病死率#</a>？世界卫生组织驻华代表高力介绍，①疫情暴发初期，病死率较高，这在新发传染病出现时非常常见，病例激增时卫生系统已经不堪重负；②全球在病例管理政策方面也会有变化，比如最初轻症可能没有作为病例计算进来；③中国的政策 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICedP1UE0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491111370456072:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491111370456072&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E4%BB%A3%E8%A1%A8%E7%A7%B0%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%B0%9A%E6%9C%AA%E8%BE%BE%E5%88%B0%E9%A1%B6%E5%B3%B0%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织代表称全球疫情尚未达到顶峰#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%97%B6%E5%80%99%E6%89%8D%E8%83%BD%E8%AF%B4%E7%9C%9F%E6%AD%A3%E6%88%98%E8%83%9C%E4%BA%86%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#什么时候才能说真正战胜了疫情#</a>？世界卫生组织驻华代表高力介绍，看到这样的致死率和这些触目惊心的数字能够想到的就是新冠肺炎对人类的经济和社会发展造成了多么大的影响，数字依然在增长，而且很明显尚未到达顶峰。什么时候我们才能说真正已经战胜了这场疫 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICe4yx6XD" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491105627891585:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491105627891585&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7291617014" usercard="id=7291617014">城南月涌</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member5"></em></a>：重点是哪些贫穷落后国家，属于第三波国家，第一-波是东亚，第二波是美欧。这些国家无论如何爆发，最终都是有控制能力的。第三波是中东南亚非洲南美,那些地方如果失控，将是真正的人间地狱。        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#你好武汉#</a>【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E8%A7%A3%E8%AF%BB%E6%8C%81%E7%BB%AD%E5%81%9A%E5%A5%BD%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%B0%81%E6%8E%A7%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#湖北解读持续做好小区封控管理工作#</a>】下午四点，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第66场新闻发布会，解读《关于建立疫情防控长效机制持续做好小区封控管理工作的通知》，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播，一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4491105460384259:1034-video:1034%3A4491119468412948:page_100206_home:2803301701:4491105460384259:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZeH4ho" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZeH4ho" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E6%98%A5%E7%9A%84%E9%80%86%E8%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#青春的逆行#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2390%25%E7%9A%84%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E6%98%AF80%E5%90%8E90%E5%90%8E%23&amp;from=default">#90%的援鄂护士是80后90后#</a>，向青春的力量致敬！】医政医管局监察专员郭燕红透露，4.26万<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E4%B8%AD%E6%9C%892.86%E4%B8%87%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%23&amp;from=default">#援鄂医务队员中有2.86万护士#</a>，占了近70%；其中80后和90后占护士总数的90%，90后护士占比达到了40%。年轻的护士不畏艰险冲锋在前，舍身忘死，彰显了青春的蓬勃力量，为青年人树立了楷模。从性别来 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICe20c6CZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491104042885417:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491104042885417&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E5%8D%AB%E5%81%A5%E5%A7%94%E6%B2%89%E7%97%9B%E5%93%80%E6%82%BC%E5%BC%A0%E9%9D%99%E9%9D%99%E5%90%8C%E5%BF%97%23&amp;from=default">#山东卫健委沉痛哀悼张静静同志#</a>】山东卫健委：山东省第一批援鄂医疗队员、山东大学齐鲁医院呼吸与危重症医学科主管护师张静静同志，在离鄂返鲁后按规定集中隔离医学观察期满，即将返家休息时，突发心脏骤停，经全力救治无效，于2020年4月6日18时58分不幸逝世。山东省卫生健康委员会对张静静同志的不 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICdSr9z5s" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491098112279830:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491098112279830&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3248036930" usercard="id=3248036930">zu海洋</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a class="icon_icon" title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://car.weibo.com/pc/view?page=123456"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans6"></i></a>：各地医疗队撤出湖北，举国哀悼，并不意味着疫情结束。相反，全世界都在坚持抗疫！于国，世界各国还在艰难中抗疫，中国已经伸出援助之手。于民，我们应该保持警惕，不能掉以轻心。“山川异域，风月同天”。这就是一场战争，没有枪炮声却牺牲很多人的战争。只有全人类战胜病毒，我们才能平安的生活！        </div>

                                <a name="4491094941709710" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICdNk7aLY?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 15:18" date="1586243937000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491094941709710:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 15:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%A6%E4%BF%83%E5%8F%B0%E6%B9%BE%E5%BD%93%E5%B1%80%E7%AB%8B%E5%8D%B3%E6%94%B9%E5%8F%98%E9%92%88%E5%AF%B9%E9%99%86%E7%94%9F%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%8D%E5%90%88%E7%90%86%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%23&amp;from=default">#敦促台湾当局立即改变针对陆生的不合理限制#</a>】2月6日，台湾当局宣布暂停大陆居民赴台，而台湾各高校已于2月底至3月初陆续开学，使得大多数在台湾就读学历的大陆学生无法正常返校。此举严重损害了在台湾高校就读大陆学生的正当权益。对于近一段时间以来广大陆生的强烈诉求，台湾当局仍漠然处 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICdNk7aLY" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491094941709710:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491094941709710&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E9%9D%99%E9%9D%99%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#张静静援鄂日记#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%8D%AB%E5%81%A5%E5%A7%94%E5%90%91%E5%BC%A0%E9%9D%99%E9%9D%99%E8%87%B4%E6%95%AC%23&amp;from=default">#国家卫健委向张静静致敬#</a>：人民会永远感激和怀念】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人、宣传司副司长米锋介绍，昨天，山东省第一批援鄂医疗队员、山东大学齐鲁医院主管护师张静静永远离开我们，让人心痛。她曾在援鄂日记中写道：本想像当初来时一样悄悄返回，但我热爱的土地人民感恩的心使我 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICdMOq4qt" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491094626213545:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491094626213545&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E4%BB%8D%E9%9D%A2%E4%B8%B4%E9%9B%B6%E6%98%9F%E6%95%A3%E5%8F%91%E6%88%96%E5%B1%80%E9%83%A8%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%E5%8F%8C%E9%87%8D%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%23&amp;from=default">#我国仍面临零星散发或局部暴发双重风险#</a>】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人、宣传司副司长米锋表示，4月6日，中国本土无新增确诊病例，无新增疑似病例，无新增死亡病例，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E9%99%8D%E5%88%B0200%E4%BE%8B%E4%BB%A5%E5%86%85%23&amp;from=default">#本土重症病例首次降到200例以内#</a>。当前，境内疫情多日呈现零星散发态势，欧美疫情仍在快速上升， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICdKY64nf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491093481446785:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491093481446785&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4491085344661492" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICdxQjyFm?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 14:40" date="1586241649000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491085344661492:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 14:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">深度报道 · 视频社区</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E3%E5%A4%A9%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F%E4%B8%80%E7%9B%B4%E5%9C%A8%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山清明3天假期一直在工作#</a>：医生看的不是病，而是病人】84岁的钟南山院士，清明节期间一直在办公室工作。接受采访时，他说：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E7%9C%8B%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%AF%E7%97%85%E8%80%8C%E6%98%AF%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#医生看的不是病而是病人#</a>。不要更多地感染，减少死亡，作为医生，还有什么比这个更重要？“中国的医务人员，从来都是白衣天使，没有变过”。致敬，守护生命的他们↓（ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICdxQjyFm" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491085344661492:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491085344661492&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">

                                                                                                                        【转发致敬！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E9%A2%86%E5%9F%9F%E9%A1%B6%E9%85%8D%E9%98%B5%E5%AE%B9%23&amp;from=default">#中国重症领域顶配阵容#</a>：仍然坚守在武汉的<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E5%85%AB%E4%BB%99%23&amp;from=default">#重症八仙#</a>】近日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%E5%8D%8E%E8%A5%BF%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=四川大学华西医院">@四川大学华西医院</a> 发布微博：8位专家组成员进驻7家重症定点医院，与各医疗队一起，在武汉攻坚最后的“重症堡垒”，被称为重症八仙。他们分别是：东南大学附属中大医院副院长 邱海波（左四）、北京朝阳医院副院长 童朝晖（右三 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICdjAe7fx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491076503364463:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491076503364463&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A9%E6%B4%A5%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#天津开学时间#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A9%E6%B4%A5%E5%88%9D%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%894%E6%9C%8820%E6%97%A5%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#天津初高三4月20日开学#</a>】今天，天津市疫情防控工作指挥部发出通告：4月20日，全市初中、普通高中毕业年级同步复课开学，开始正常上课。5月上旬或中旬，全市高等院校（含高职院校）、中等职业学校（含技工学校）毕业年级分专业、分批次有序复课开学。<a title="天津初三、高三4月20日复课开学！" href="http://t.cn/A6Zez9Ib" alt="http://t.cn/A6Zez9Ib" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>天津初三、高三4月20日复课开学！</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4491067623307771" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICd5gdSv9?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 13:30" date="1586237424000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491067623307771:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 13:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%88%E9%98%B3%E5%8F%91%E6%94%BE3000%E4%B8%87%E5%85%83%E6%B6%88%E8%B4%B9%E5%88%B8%23&amp;from=default">#沈阳发放3000万元消费券#</a>，可用于超市生鲜百货餐饮消费等】7日，记者了解到，沈阳8部门联合发布关于提振市场信心促进商业消费的实施意见，4-6月份开展“惠民消费季”活动。通过与第三方支付平台合作，发放餐饮消费券和综合消费券，面向沈阳市居民，户籍不限。发放额度分别为2000万元和1000万元，每 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICd5gdSv9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491067623307771:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491067623307771&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609510919&amp;ssig=vF22Wwd7Zi" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4491062905547072" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICcXEnh2U?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 13:11" date="1586236299000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491062905547072:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 13:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

            </li>

        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">

    </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609510919&amp;ssig=vF22Wwd7Zi" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4491057842607131" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICcPuaWev?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 12:51" date="1586235092000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491057842607131:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 12:51</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【我总领馆发布提醒：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%85%AC%E6%B0%91%E5%88%87%E5%8B%BF%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%E5%8F%A3%E5%B2%B8%E5%9B%9E%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#中国公民切勿通过绥芬河口岸回国#</a>】中国驻符拉迪沃斯托克总领事馆今日发布提醒，提醒中国公民切勿通过绥芬河口岸回国：①截至目前，通过莫斯科-符拉迪沃斯托克-绥芬河路线输入黑龙江的新冠肺炎确诊病例已经累计达59例，均为中国籍。②目前有个别华商在微信朋友圈散布绥芬河口岸将 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICcPuaWev" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491057842607131:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491057842607131&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F18.9%E4%B8%87%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江18.9万高三毕业生开学#</a>：戴口罩排队入校，教室课桌距离增大】7日，黑龙江省368所普通高中的18.9万名毕业班级学生<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#开学#</a>，这是新冠肺炎疫情暴发后，黑龙江省首批复学的学生。早晨进学校时，学生们都戴着口罩，有序排队，接受体温测量和手部消毒；上课时，老师已预先将课桌之间的距离增大。在哈 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICcDVjbaU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491050674571192:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491050674571192&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx4.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2Fa716fd45ly1gdl2gxuradj20go0t6th5.jpg">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4491039727679058" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICcmgwdFM?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 11:39" date="1586230773000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491039727679058:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 11:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E6%8E%92%E6%9F%A5%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%B05%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#广州排查发现5例境外输入#</a>】4月7日，广州市第68场疫情防控新闻通气会通报：全面排查期间，在越秀区矿泉街的入境人员中检测出5例确诊病例，均为尼日利亚籍，皆为集中医学观察期间筛查发现。疾控机构开展流行病学调查发现，上述5例确诊病例中，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E4%E5%90%8D%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%9B%BE%E5%A4%9A%E6%AC%A1%E5%A4%96%E5%87%BA%E7%94%A8%E9%A4%90%23&amp;from=default">#广州4名确诊外国人曾多次外出用餐#</a>，短时间内多次到越秀 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICcmgwdFM" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491039727679058:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491039727679058&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->

                        <li class="WB_pic li_1 S_bg1 S_line2 bigcursor li_n_mix_h " action-data="isGoldenV=0&amp;isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1gdl1w6c72fj20j60j6767&amp;object_ids=1042018%3A62275b41b2969b1e1c4b562b629de915&amp;photo_tag_pids=&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;mid=4491039727679058&amp;pic_ids=a716fd45ly1gdl1w6c72fj20j60j6767&amp;pic_objects=" action-type="feed_list_media_img" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_newimage_feed&amp;value=image_feed_unfold:4491039727679058:a716fd45ly1gdl1w6c72fj20j60j6767:2803301701:0">

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E8%B6%8A%E7%A7%80%E5%8C%BA%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%9410%E4%B8%87%E5%A4%96%E7%B1%8D%E4%BA%BA%E5%A3%AB%E5%B1%85%E4%BD%8F%E4%BC%A0%E9%97%BB%23&amp;from=default">#广州越秀区回应10万外籍人士居住传闻#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E8%B6%8A%E7%A7%80%E5%8C%BA%E5%85%B1%E5%B1%85%E4%BD%8F3642%E5%90%8D%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#广州越秀区共居住3642名外国人#</a>】针对网络上流传的十万甚至数十万外籍人士在广州越秀区居住，其中又以非洲籍外国人为主的传闻，广州市政府新闻发布会今天（4月7日）进行了澄清。目前，在越秀居住的外籍人士共3642人，来源地排名前五的分别是美国，马里、尼日利 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICcjAbJ97" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491038062795153:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491038062795153&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E4%B8%80%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%B1%8D%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E6%8B%92%E4%B8%8D%E9%85%8D%E5%90%88%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E8%A2%AB%E9%99%90%E6%9C%9F%E5%87%BA%E5%A2%83%23&amp;from=default">#广州一入境外籍男子拒不配合隔离被限期出境#</a>】3月22日，广州越秀区疾控中心将一名外籍男子转运到酒店进行集中隔离医学观察时，该男子趁工作人员不备，擅自离开集中隔离医学观察点，拒不执行广州市政府颁布的决定命令。今天上午，广州市政府新闻办疫情防控新闻通气会上通报，越秀区公安分局于3月30日 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICcc0zS15" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491033368549123:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491033368549123&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4491029086718193" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICc56sbHX?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-07 10:57" date="1586228236000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4491029086718193:fromprofile"> 2020-4-7 10:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E8%A2%AB%E6%8A%A2%E6%95%91%E5%85%A8%E7%A8%8B%E7%94%BB%E9%9D%A2%23&amp;from=default">#感染新冠医生被抢救全程画面#</a>】武汉医生胡卫锋感染新冠肺炎后，病情一直不见好转。中国工程院副院长、中国工程院<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%8B%E8%BE%B0%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E4%B8%BA%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E6%8F%90%E5%87%BA%E6%95%91%E6%B2%BB%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88%23&amp;from=default">#王辰院士为感染医生提出救治方案#</a>，更换ECMO导管。方案难度大，风险高，北京中日友好医院专家组慎重评估后，决定承担风险更换导管。导管更换后，胡卫锋医生终于好转。同心抗疫，是这个 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICc56sbHX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4491029086718193:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4491029086718193&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="list_con">
                    <div class="WB_text">
                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2853919010" usercard="id=2853919010">天蝎琳琳2012</a>：8号解封是外省可以进来。之前进来的也可以出去了，但出武汉的前提是要进行核酸检测，两次检测阴，并有武汉隔离14天的健康码才能出去。然后武汉的小区不解封，还是管控。有复工证明和健康码并进行复工核酸检测阴性的才能拿到防疫部门出的每天可以进出小区的通行证。群众只能购买生活用品可以出去两小时                    </div>
                                        <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                             【你们辛苦了！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E6%9C%BA%E9%95%BF%E6%8E%A5%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%80%E6%89%B9%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E5%9B%9E%E5%AE%B6%23&from=default\">#英雄机长接四川最后一批援鄂队员回家#<\/a>】4月7日，四川最后一批援鄂医疗队员回家，英雄机长刘传健熟悉的身影再次出现。四川最后一批援鄂医疗队员162人包括华西医院140人、疾控三队14人、中国医学科学院输血研究所6人、以及国家单独抽调的华西医院、成都公卫中心的2名院感专家。                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%898%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E5%87%BA%E7%A7%9F%E8%BD%A6%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%23&from=default\">#武汉8日起恢复出租车运营#<\/a> 】4月8日起，武汉市将恢复出租车运营，并将根据疫情形势变化和市场状况，适时恢复网约车运营。据悉，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%87%BA%E7%A7%9F%E8%BD%A6%E5%B0%86%E5%AE%9E%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%80%E8%BD%A6%E4%B8%80%E7%A0%81%23&from=default\">#武汉出租车将实行一车一码#<\/a>，驾驶员全程戴口罩为乘客提供服务，乘客凭健康码“绿码”实名登记扫码乘车。武汉市客管处表示，已要求各出租车企业召回车辆，对车辆进行全面
